item.title: Hercules eCAFÉ EX HD
item.description: The eCAFÉ Ex HD netbook by US based computer manufacturer Hercules is a slim and lightweight netbook with a claimed battery life of 13 hours.

item.title: Hercules eCAFÉ Slim HD
item.description: The eCAFÉ Slim HD netbook by US based computer manufacturer Hercules is claimed to be the slimmest and lightest model in its category.
